# Hiring Crew
As the Captain of a Nanotrasen vessel, you have the authority to hire and fire crew members, and to delegate work at will. There are two ways to hire crew: - Use the [color=#a4885c]station records computer[/color] on your ship to open crew slots. Players that join later can spawn in on your ship. - Invite other players to join your crew through in-game communications.
Crew membership is informally enforced - you don't need to sign any forms (but feel free to roleplay!), but it's a good idea to make sure your crew understand what you expect of them, and what they can expect from you (an hourly wage, a split of future rewards). Remember, you're responsible for the well-being of your crew, and a captain's only as good as their word!
